entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
